thread.title: Deutsche Bank to restructure business, part ways with key execs
thread.title_full: Deutsche Bank to restructure business, part ways with key execs

author: From cnbc.com
title: Deutsche Bank to restructure business, part ways with key execs
text: From cnbc.com German banking giant Deutsche Bank on Sunday announced a sweeping reorganization plan designed to "fundamentally change" how it does business, cleaving its investment bank into two parts and parting ways with some of its key executives. As the bank continues to grapple with the fallout of trading and governance scandals, Deutsche made an announcement that was widely anticipated by Wall Street watchers. Accordingly, the bank plans to reshuffle a number of top level managers, including top securities trading executives. In a statement, Deutsche said it plans to combine its corporate finance and global transaction banking ... (
